EmailTemplate.name: Electronic Notary software provider reminder - submission
EmailTemplate.subject: We need the name of your electronic notary software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You applied for an Electronic Records Notary Public endorsement on {!Endorsement__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You must send us the name of the software you will be using within 30 days after we issue the endorsement.
You can’t notarize electronic records until we’ve received the name of your software.
Provide the information through our new online system:
Go to {!Endorsement__c.License_Portal_URL__c} Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
Or email us:
Your Notary Public Commission name. Your license number. Name of your electronic notary software.
Questions? Need help? {!Endorsement__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Endorsement__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Endorsement__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP020
